content.text:
# 1991 Kids' Choice Awards

| next             = 1992
}}
The '''5th Annual Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards''' was held on April 22, 1991. The show was hosted by Corin Nemec. The 1991 Kids' Choice Awards introduced the KCA Hall of Fame Award.
Winners and nominees
Below is a partial list of nominees and complete list of winners. Winners are listed first, in bold. Other nominees are in alphabetical order.
Movies
{| class="wikitable" style="width:100%"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Favorite Movie
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Favorite Movie Actor
|-
| valign="top" |
* Home Alone
** House Party
** Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
| valign="top" |
* Arnold Schwarzenegger – Kindergarten Cop as John Kimble
** Johnny Depp
** Eddie Murphy
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82;" colspan="2"| Favorite Movie Actress
|-
| colspan="2" valign="top" |
* Julia Roberts – Pretty Woman as Vivian Ward
** Kirstie Alley
** Whoopi Goldberg
|}
Television
{| class="wikitable" style="width:100%"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Favorite TV Show
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Favorite TV Actor
|-
| valign="top" |
* The Simpsons
** In Living Color
** The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
| valign="top" |
* Will Smith – The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air as Will Smith
** Bill Cosby – The Cosby Show as Cliff Huxtable
** Kirk Cameron – Growing Pains as Mike Seaver
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82;" colspan="2"| Favorite TV Actress
|-
| colspan="2" valign="top" |
* Keshia Knight Pulliam – The Cosby Show as Rudy Huxtable
** Kirstie Alley – Cheers as Rebecca Howe
** Roseanne Barr – Roseanne as Roseanne Conner
|}

|-

** "Step by Step" – New Kids on the Block

|}
